UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

Report.title: Generated Report
Report.description: Represents a report generated by the AI.

reportTitle.description: A unique and descriptive title for the report.

generatedAt.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the report was generated.

sourcePage.description: The page from which the report was generated (e.g., Analytics, Email).

summary.description: A summary of the report's findings.

uid.description: The ID of the user who generated the report.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, keyed by user ID.

/users/{userId}/reports/{reportId}.description: Stores AI-generated reports for a user.
